14 struct V_COREEXPORT ArrayLoader {
15 
16  struct ArrayOwner {
17  virtual ~ArrayOwner() {}
18  };
19 
20  template<typename T>
21  struct Unreffer: public ArrayOwner {
22  explicit Unreffer(ShmVector<T> &ref): m_ref(ref) {}
23  ShmVector<T> m_ref;
24  };
25 
26  ArrayLoader(const std::string &name, int type, const vistle::iarchive &ar);
27  ArrayLoader() = delete;
28  ArrayLoader(const ArrayLoader &other) = delete;
29 
30  std::shared_ptr<ArrayOwner> m_unreffer;
31 
32  template<typename T>
33  void operator()(T) {
34  if (shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() == m_type) {
35  if (m_ok) {
36  m_ok = false;
37  std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: multiple type matches for data array " << m_name << std::endl;
38  return;
39  }
40  ShmVector<T> arr;
41  if (!m_name.empty())
42  arr = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<T>(m_name);
43  if (arr) {
44  std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: already have data array with name " << m_name << std::endl;
45  m_unreffer.reset(new Unreffer<T>(arr));
46  return;
47  }
48  auto &ar = const_cast<vistle::iarchive &>(m_ar);
49  std::string arname;
50  ar & arname;
51  assert(arname == m_arname);
52  m_name = ar.translateArrayName(arname);
53  arr = ShmVector<T>((shm_name_t)m_name);
54  if (!arr.valid())
55  arr.construct();
56  //std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: loading " << arname << " as " << m_name << ": arr=" << arr << std::endl;
57  m_name = arr.name().str();
58  ar.registerArrayNameTranslation(arname, arr.name());
59  //std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: constructed " << arname << " as " << arr.name() << std::endl;
60  ar & *arr;
61  m_unreffer.reset(new Unreffer<T>(arr));
62  m_ok = true;
63  }
64  }
65 
66  bool load();
67  const std::string &name() const;
68  std::shared_ptr<ArrayOwner> owner() const;
69 
70  bool m_ok;
71  std::string m_arname; //<! name in archive
72  std::string m_name; //<! name in shmem
73  int m_type;
74  const vistle::iarchive &m_ar;
75 };
76
